alert.note: Alert for Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hyde County through 745 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Portsmouth Village, or 15 miles northeast of Cedar Island, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocracoke Lighthouse and Ocracoke Ferry Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
